ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Truly Allah, He is the Provider, the Possessor of Strength, the Sure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God is certainly the great provider, Lord of strength and power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely Allah is the Bestower of all provision, the Lord of all power, the Strong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is God Who is the Sustainer and the Lord of invincible strength.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed it is Allah, Who is the Greatest Sustainer, the Strong, the Able.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, Allah is the All-Provider, Owner of power, the Most Strong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely Allah is the Bestower of sustenance, the Lord of Power, the Strong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely God is the All-provider, the Possessor of Strength, the Ever-Sure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! Allah! He it is that giveth livelihood, the Lord of unbreakable might.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: it is God who is the great Sustainer, the Mighty One, the Invincible.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily Allah! He is the Provider, Owner of power, Firm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed it is Allah who is the All-provider, Powerful and All-strong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For Allah is He Who gives (all) Sustenance,- Lord of Power,- Steadfast (for ever).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, Allah is the All-Provider, Owner of Power, the Most Strong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, Allah is the Provider, the Possessor of Power, the Mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God is the Provider, the One with Power, the Strong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:58] Indeed it is God Who is the Provider, the Lord of Strength, the Firm, the Stern.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Allah! He it is that giveth livelihood) to His slaves, (the Lord of unbreakable might) against His enemies, Who has in store a severe chastisement for them.
